allowDeselect.description: Determines whether it should be possible to deselect value by clicking on the selected option, true by default
allowDeselect.description_zh: 确定是否可以通过单击所选选项来取消选择值，默认情况下为 true

checkIconPosition.description: Position of the check icon relative to the option label, 'left' by default
checkIconPosition.description_zh: 检查图标相对于选项标签的位置，默认为 'left'

clearButtonProps.description: Props passed down to the clear button
clearButtonProps.description_zh: 传递到 clear 按钮的 props

clearable.description: Determines whether the clear button should be displayed in the right section when the component has value, false by default
clearable.description_zh: 确定当组件具有值（默认为 false）时，是否应在右侧部分显示 clear 按钮

comboboxProps.description: Props passed down to Combobox component
comboboxProps.description_zh: 传递给 Combobox 组件的 props

defaultDropdownOpened.description_zh: 不受控制的下拉列表初始打开状态

description.description: Contents of Input.Description component. If not set, description is not rendered.
description.description_zh: Input.Description 组件的内容。如果未设置，则不会呈现 description。

descriptionProps.description: Props passed down to the Input.Description component
descriptionProps.description_zh: 向下传递到 Input.Description 组件的 props

disabled.description: Sets disabled attribute on the input element
disabled.description_zh: 在 input 元素上设置 disabled 属性

dropdownOpened.description_zh: 受控下拉列表打开状态

error.description: Contents of Input.Error component. If not set, error is not rendered.
error.description_zh: Input.Error 组件的内容。如果未设置，则不会呈现 error。

errorProps.description: Props passed down to the Input.Error component
errorProps.description_zh: 向下传递到 Input.Error 组件的 props

filter.description: Function based on which items are filtered and sorted
filter.description_zh: 基于筛选和排序的项目的功能

hiddenInputProps.description: Props passed down to the hidden input
hiddenInputProps.description_zh: 向下传递到隐藏输入的 props

inputContainer.description: Input container component, React.Fragment by default
inputContainer.description_zh: 输入容器组件，默认为 React.Fragment

inputSize.description: size prop added to the input element
inputSize.description_zh: size 属性添加到 input 元素

inputWrapperOrder.description: Controls order of the elements, ['label', 'description', 'input', 'error'] by default

label.description: Contents of Input.Label component. If not set, label is not rendered.
label.description_zh: Input.Label 组件的内容。如果未设置，则不会渲染 label。

labelProps.description: Props passed down to the Input.Label component
labelProps.description_zh: 向下传递到 Input.Label 组件的 Props

leftSection.description: Content section rendered on the left side of the input
leftSection.description_zh: 在输入的左侧呈现的内容部分

leftSectionPointerEvents.description: Sets pointer-events styles on the leftSection element, 'none' by default
leftSectionPointerEvents.description_zh: 在 leftSection 元素上设置 pointer-events 样式，默认为 'none'

leftSectionProps.description: Props passed down to the leftSection element
leftSectionProps.description_zh: 向下传递到 leftSection 元素的 props

leftSectionWidth.description: Left section width, used to set width of the section and input padding-left, by default equals to the input height
leftSectionWidth.description_zh: Left section width，用于设置部分的宽度和输入 padding-left，默认情况下等于输入高度

limit.description: Maximum number of options displayed at a time, Infinity by default
limit.description_zh: 一次显示的最大选项数，默认为 Infinity

maxDropdownHeight.description: max-height of the dropdown, only applicable when withScrollArea prop is true, 250 by default
maxDropdownHeight.description_zh: max-height，仅在 withScrollArea 属性为 true 时适用，默认为 250

nothingFoundMessage.description: Message displayed when no option matches the current search query while the searchable prop is set or there is no data
nothingFoundMessage.description_zh: 在设置 searchable prop 或没有数据时，没有选项与当前搜索查询匹配时显示消息

onClear.description: Called when the clear button is clicked

onOptionSubmit.description: Called when option is submitted from dropdown with mouse click or Enter key
onOptionSubmit.description_zh: 当使用鼠标单击或 Enter 键从下拉列表中提交选项时调用

pointer.description: Determines whether the input should have cursor: pointer style, false by default
pointer.description_zh: 确定输入是否应具有 cursor： pointer style，默认为 false

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, numbers are converted to rem, theme.defaultRadius by default
radius.description_zh: key的 theme.radius 或任何有效的 CSS 值来设置 border-radius，数字默认转换为 rem，theme.defaultRadius

renderOption.description: A function to render content of the option, replaces the default content of the option
renderOption.description_zh: 用于渲染选项内容的函数，替换选项的默认内容

required.description: Adds required attribute to the input and a red asterisk on the right side of label, false by default
required.description_zh: 将 required 属性添加到输入中，并在 label 的右侧添加红色星号，默认为 false

rightSection.description: Content section rendered on the right side of the input
rightSection.description_zh: 内容部分呈现在输入的右侧

rightSectionPointerEvents.description: Sets pointer-events styles on the rightSection element, 'none' by default
rightSectionPointerEvents.description_zh: 在 rightSection 元素上设置 pointer-events 样式，默认为 'none'

rightSectionProps.description: Props passed down to the rightSection element
rightSectionProps.description_zh: 向下传递到 rightSection 元素的 Props

rightSectionWidth.description: Right section width, used to set width of the section and input padding-right, by default equals to the input height
rightSectionWidth.description_zh: Right section width，用于设置截面宽度和输入 padding-right，默认情况下等于输入高度

scrollAreaProps.description: Props passed down to the underlying ScrollArea component in the dropdown
scrollAreaProps.description_zh: 在下拉列表中向下传递到底层 ScrollArea 组件的 props

searchable.description: Determines whether the select should be searchable, false by default
searchable.description_zh: 确定 select 是否应为可搜索对象，默认为 false

selectFirstOptionOnChange.description: Determines whether the first option should be selected when value changes, false by default
selectFirstOptionOnChange.description_zh: 确定值更改时是否应选择第一个选项，默认情况下为 false

size.description: Controls input height and horizontal padding, 'sm' by default
size.description_zh: 控制输入高度和水平填充，默认为 'sm'

withAsterisk.description: Determines whether the required asterisk should be displayed. Overrides required prop. Does not add required attribute to the input. false by default
withAsterisk.description_zh: 确定是否应显示所需的星号。Overrides required 属性。不向输入添加 required 属性。false 默认

withCheckIcon.description: Determines whether check icon should be displayed near the selected option label, true by default
withCheckIcon.description_zh: 确定是否应在所选选项标签附近显示复选图标，默认情况下为 true

withErrorStyles.description: Determines whether the input should have red border and red text color when the error prop is set, true by default
withErrorStyles.description_zh: 确定设置 error 属性时，input 是否应具有红色边框和红色文本颜色，默认为 true

withScrollArea.description: Determines whether the options should be wrapped with ScrollArea.AutoSize, true by default
withScrollArea.description_zh: 确定是否应使用 ScrollArea.AutoSize 包装选项，默认情况下为 true

wrapperProps.description: Props passed down to the root element
wrapperProps.description_zh: 向下传递到根元素的 props
